author: Yogi Berra
message: You got to be careful if you don't know where you're going, because you might not get there.
title: Thought of the day

author: Naguib Mahfouz
message: You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anthony Robbins
message: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more
title: Thought of the day

author: John Wooden
message: You can't let praise or criticism get to you. It's a weakness to get caught up in either one.
title: Thought of the day
